participant_1.name: Alex Thompson
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and introspective, Alex loves pushing boundaries and exploring new experiences.
participant_1.background: i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i am a stunt double as my second job. i read twenty books a year. i was raised in a single parent household. i only eat kosher.

participant_2.name: Jordan Smith
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, Jordan finds joy in hands-on activities and values connection with nature.
participant_2.background: i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i am terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. i just got a job working in a gas station. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening.
